headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Bank Earnings, Soft Inflation Help Boost Index
summary: The S&P 500 jumped 1.8% on Wednesday, Jan. 15, as several financial firms reported solid results and a downtick in core inflation revived rate-cut hopes.

headline: JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs Post Surging Profits
